```{r, message = FALSE}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "What.is.your.usual.level.of.pain..how.does.your.pain.feel.most.of.the.time.."
q_data <- get_single_selection_0(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <-
  q_data %>%
  group_by(response) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  mutate(percent_responded = round(100*(count / q_n), 2)) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))
```

```{r}
r <- 
  ggplot(q_plot, aes(x = reorder(response, count), y = percent_responded)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity') +
  coord_flip() +
  geom_text(aes(label= paste(round(percent_responded, 0), count, sep = "%:"))) +
  xlab("Response") +
  ylab("% Responded, Count") +
  labs(title = "What is your usual level of pain (how does your pain feel most of the time?)", subtitle = q_n)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'output/q9_usual_pain.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'output/q9_usual_pain_217.csv', row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(q_data, 'output/q9_usual_pain_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
